about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Strengthening Consumer Protection in Kosovo
about.content: The objective of this assignment is to support the project in assessing and enhancing the scalability of the ECO HUB KOSOVO platform (Interdomestik), ensuring it can effectively handle increased user traffic, data volume, and feature expansion while maintaining performance and reliability. The Consultant shall engage with 15â€“20 trained participants to test the platform's functionality, usability, and performance. Based on the findings, the Consultant will provide actionable recommendations for optimization and scalability.
